channel.title: Webclient connection error?
channel.description: ok, so i decided to test my client before i jar it, and make the html page, its still in regular client form, i applied all the codes however to make it a webclient, i uploaded the cache, set the link in the correct place, it downloads the cache, but after it does, it says connection error retrying in (seconds) what am i doing wrong?

item.title: Webclient connection error?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

ok, so i decided to test my client before i jar it, and make the html page, its still in regular client form, i applied all the codes however to make it a webclient, i uploaded the cache, set the link in the correct place, it downloads the cache, but after it does, it says connection error retrying in (seconds)
what am i doing wrong?
